lenders.name: Wade
lenders.occupation: Future Entrepreneur, Sales and Marketing guru

lenders.name: Danielle
lenders.loan_because: It makes me feel good to know I made a difference in the world
lenders.occupational_info: Its middle school- what can I say????

lenders.name: john&maryrose
lenders.loan_because: we are not rich ,but if we can help in a small way,we feel we must.
lenders.occupational_info: I work for a water dept. we install water mains for drinking water&Fire hydrants,valves and maint.the system. My wife is a Physical Therapist asst.

lenders.name: Erica and family
lenders.loan_because: we loan because we know that in many ways our lives here in the U.S. benefit from the resources from the countries, communities, and people we are lending to- we loan because we should
lenders.occupational_info: I work with victims of domestic violence who are starting a new and independent life free from violence.

lenders.name: Marc
lenders.loan_because: For the joy of helping others and for the pleasure in seeing my small donations change the lives of other people.
lenders.occupational_info: I work for a large company that advises other large companies on how they can improve their businesses

lenders.name: Fred and Team
lenders.loan_because: We loan because we want to make a difference!
lenders.occupational_info: Information Technology Specialist

lenders.name: FARGO & SIENA Barsotti
lenders.loan_because: We all need a little help at some point!
lenders.occupational_info: Just  kids.... usually making a mess!

lenders.name: Kal
lenders.loan_because:
-- I like to help women entrepreneurs in developing countries.  
-- I am glad to be of help to those from the countries (Kenya, Tanzania, Ecuador, Peru, Cambodia) where I have travelled in the past , enjoyed the local hospitality and had a memorable time. 
-- \"Microloan\" works!   I am very familiar with how microloans actually help(ed) the families in Indian villages
lenders.occupational_info: I am an Engineer. I enjoy travelling in developing countries and learning new languages

lenders.name: Ann
lenders.loan_because: How can you not?
lenders.occupational_info: My business is based on supporting and guiding visual artists - particularly portrait artists.

lenders.name: Laurel
lenders.loan_because: Kiva embodies the spirit I most like to see in a 'charity' - helping someone develop a sustainable, self-sufficient lifestyle. I love the stories and am inspired by the entrepreneurial spirit of the folks on the receiving end of the loans. I also like the fact that I can help multiple people with the same money, since beneficiaries are so great about paying loans back!
lenders.occupational_info: I am a full-time college student, studying journalism at the University of Idaho.

lenders.name: Lori
lenders.loan_because: I want to see their dreams and hopes flourish.
lenders.occupational_info: I\'m a stay at home mom, taking care of my three year old son and managing our household.

lenders.name: Sandro
lenders.loan_because: I want to help people in realizing their dreams.
lenders.occupational_info: I work for a big Software Company.

lenders.name: Jody
lenders.loan_because: I learned The Golden Rule in kindergarden.  Ethics made simple.
lenders.occupational_info: I take people out into nature, mostly in small boats powered by paddles or oars, and let them enjoy seeing the water, trees, birds, and all.  I give them a chance to have fun, to refresh their spirits, and to reconnect with the natural world.

lenders.name: Gary/Ila
lenders.loan_because: Because we have much and so many have so little

lenders.name: Jessica
lenders.loan_because: There's nothing more comforting than a helping hand...

lenders.name: Terry
lenders.loan_because: If I can make a difference in someones life by just loaning an amount of money that I would just blow on a day \"hangin out\" I think I should try to balance the two out.
lenders.occupational_info: I work for the city to help two managers distribute government money and grants to schools who help people in need.

lenders.name: Rachel
lenders.loan_because: It\'s interesting!
lenders.occupational_info: I work in an Architecture Firm.

lenders.name: Don
lenders.loan_because: everybody deserves a chance to make their own way

lenders.name: Kim
lenders.loan_because: We have more than we could possibly want or need. We respect the entrepreneurs on your site.

lenders.name: Al & Kindra
lenders.loan_because: It's nice to be able to make such a difference in someone's life.

lenders.name: Brody Memorial Fund
lenders.loan_because: To allow Brody the Dog to help people around the world.

lenders.name: Zoe
lenders.occupation: I study how giving makes people feel wealthy
lenders.loan_because: I love supporting individual entrepreneurs, especially helping out in Africa, where capital is needed most.
lenders.occupational_info: I run surveys and experiments, and then write about them

lenders.name: Robert
lenders.loan_because: I have seen the difference that micro-loans can make in  people's lives and their community.
lenders.occupational_info: I work as a Regulatory Biologist.

lenders.name: Ellen
lenders.loan_because: Everyone deserves a chance.
lenders.occupational_info: I arrange transportation of chemicals to other businesses for electronics.

lenders.name: Melissa
lenders.loan_because: These loans make a big difference in peoples lives, if we can loan I think we should. I love the fact that I can help people help themselves, kiva makes this very easy!

lenders.name: Steve
lenders.loan_because: It's important to offer funding to those who are otherwise ignored by traditional capital markets.
lenders.occupational_info: I introduce new technology in developing countries (computer access and applications).

lenders.name: Robbie G.
lenders.loan_because: I want to help those who want to help themselves.  This is a great way for people to support their familes.
lenders.occupational_info: I manage accounts for a software company in the United States.

lenders.name: Chris
lenders.occupational_info: Business Development

lenders.name: Don
lenders.loan_because: I believe helping start, sustain and expand small businesses in the developing world is the best way for me to make a difference there.

lenders.name: Andy
lenders.loan_because: God has been good to me, and He has given many blessings to me through the generosity of my parents, people at my church, and friends.
lenders.occupational_info: I teach seventh grade English and World Geography at a private Christian school.  I also coach basketball and track.

lenders.name: Guy
lenders.loan_because: When its this easy to help someone out........
lenders.occupational_info: I provide technology services to businesses.

lenders.name: Pondering Pig
lenders.loan_because: I never had the opportunity before to help out people in places like Togo before.  It's great!
lenders.occupational_info: I write a blog.  I'm a pig.  I ponder.

lenders.name: Aileen
lenders.loan_because: I am very grateful for all that I have but I also understand that I have more than I need.

lenders.name: Seymour Family
lenders.loan_because: we are interested in empowering individuals through investment in their trade and community.
lenders.occupational_info: I am an underwater photographer for the US National Park Service and documentary film maker for Global Benefit.

lenders.name: matthew
lenders.loan_because: I want to use what I have to help others. It\'s not alot, but it\'s often more than most people have.
lenders.occupational_info: I study to learn ways to reduce our impact on our earth.

lenders.name: Gord
lenders.loan_because: When I learned about KIVA I thought it had great potential and I wanted to be involved.

lenders.name: stephanie
lenders.loan_because: I like to empower people, if you empower people then they become less dependent on society.

lenders.name: Nancy 3.
lenders.occupational_info: I play international music and care about different cultures.  I also have a small museum with an interenational interest.

lenders.name: sue
lenders.loan_because: folks need help everywhere
lenders.occupational_info: I work for the local SPCA in the donations program.

lenders.name: Anders
lenders.loan_because: Because everyone deserves a chance to make a better life for themselves and their families.

lenders.name: Kelly
lenders.loan_because: I love the idea of being able to help people across the world better their lives and achieve their business goals.  Kiva is brilliant!
lenders.occupational_info: General contractor for the construction of inground swimming pools and spas.

lenders.name: Flower & Ghoul
lenders.loan_because: we are grateful to the people who have invested in our dreams and we want to help others in return.

lenders.name: Brad & Jan
lenders.loan_because: We would like to help make an impact on other peoples lives, especially those who have a desire to improve their lives and only need a little help to do it.
lenders.occupational_info:
Brad:  I am now retired.  I have worked with computers all my life.  I have taught at 3 universities, taught in an industrial setting, and have developed computer programs for the aerospace industry.  
Jan:  I am also retired.  I have been a elementry school teacher and librarian.  I enjoy quilting, embrodery, kniting, and many other crafts.

lenders.name: Rashida
lenders.loan_because: I want to help hose who need help and are prepared to help themselves to achieve their goals.
lenders.occupational_info: I am a champion of the underdog.

lenders.name: Robert
lenders.loan_because: I believe strongly in the power of microfinance, in entreprenuers, and in having a personal connection to people.
lenders.occupational_info: I teach nonprofit and economic development classes at a Christian university in their school of business.

lenders.name: John
lenders.loan_because: God has blessed me with the ability to help others.
lenders.occupational_info: I'm now retiered.

lenders.name: Kole
lenders.loan_because: There have been times when I have had a dollar or less to my name with no foreseeable income.  Each time, someone reached out a helping hand and pulled me through. Now that I'm in a better place, I'm paying it forward.
lenders.occupational_info: I'm a nerdy homeschooling mom, spending my free time volunteering at an animal shelter and generally facilitating creative chaos.

lenders.name: donna
lenders.loan_because: It energizes you to know that you are able to help families who are much less fortunate than you are. What a great feeling

lenders.name: Walsh Family Toronto
lenders.loan_because: Money has always been the largest obstacle I faced when trying to open a business.  We hope that our contributions will allow people to take risks that will enrich their lives.
lenders.occupational_info: Each loan is made during a pancake breakfast with our little guys who are 4 and 6 years old making all the decisions.

lenders.name: Dave
lenders.loan_because: I do because I can. I feel that it is incumbent upon those who can contribute back to do so with their time, money, and other resources when possible.
lenders.occupational_info: I work with the management of organizations (business, non-profit, and government) to help them successfully achieve a well thought out and defined mission.

lenders.name: Veronica
lenders.loan_because: I believe microfinance will produce healing in the world.

lenders.name: James
lenders.loan_because: I am fascinated by the idea of microeconomics and the ability I have to help people around the world.  I also believe that only through global community building that many of the world’s ills will be solved- KIVA is one such catalyst for community.
lenders.occupational_info: I am a teacher at a small, private middle school. I teach history to thirty students that range between 11 and 13 years of age.

lenders.name: Paul and Flavie
lenders.loan_because: Everyone needs a chance.

lenders.name: melia
lenders.loan_because: This is a most interesting process. I enjoy being part of it.

lenders.name: Josiah Mackenzie
lenders.loan_because: I believe poverty can be eradicated through private enterprise fueled by microfinance
lenders.occupational_info: I help other people make money

lenders.name: Lee
lenders.loan_because: It takes money to make money.  Kivi.org is capitalism at its best!
lenders.occupational_info: Computer Operator

lenders.name: mrshfifthgraders
lenders.loan_because: Because its important to help people who are less fortunate (Allison).  It\'s nice to help people succeed in what they want to do (Jordyn).  It makes you feel good inside (Sanjana).  You can feel good about what you\'ve done with your money.(Bari)  It makes you feel good that you\'re helping someone reach their goals (John).  Because we care (Rico).  If we don\'t help others, people may never reach their goals. (Kara).
lenders.occupational_info: 5th graders who care.

lenders.name: clair
lenders.loan_because: people just need a little help to get a start.

lenders.name: Cricket
lenders.loan_because: My mom says there are plenty of people in the world who aren't as lucky as me. It feels good to know that I can help make a difference in someone's life.
lenders.occupational_info: I like to sleep most of the day although I really look forward to long walks in the park when my mom gets home from work.

lenders.name: Scott
lenders.loan_because: I listened to a podcast interview with Kiva.org\'s Premal Shah, and was thoroughly impressed with his (and the rest of Kiva\'s) vision to alleviate poverty through microcredit.\r\nI would love to see this project scale well and succeed.
lenders.occupational_info: I\'m trying to learn as much as I can about social conditions around the world, notably in developing countries and the less affluent areas of the United States, and also about the internet technologies that may very well enable me to best help out in those areas.

lenders.name: Kristin
lenders.loan_because: It feels wonderful to know that I can truly help someone's dream come true.
lenders.occupational_info: I help developing financial representatives get their businesses off the ground.

lenders.name: George
lenders.loan_because: I should
lenders.occupational_info: Medical information systems software development

lenders.name: Michael
lenders.loan_because: It provides a means to promote a level playing field globally
lenders.occupational_info: I design wastewater treatment systems

lenders.name: Julie
lenders.loan_because: On a recent trip to Vietnam I saw a woman selling roasted corn on the street cooked on a stove contrived from a cookie tin and a few coat hangers... the corn was delicious. It reminded me that the poor living in under developed economies have to be ingenious entrepreneurs just to survive. Kiva gives this spirit traction to grow from survival to development. I am grateful for the opportunity to help and thank Kiva for making it so incredibly EASY!
lenders.occupational_info: Director of Sales for a global airline.  The airline job has allowed me to travel to over 30 countries - and to see the best and worst of our world first hand.  I'm also a Kiva volunteer!

lenders.name: Bea
lenders.loan_because:
I know what it is like to need a hand up. 

I started lending with Kiva on my birthday in 2006 (because I have been given much, I too must give).and it was the BEST present I could have given myself!   What an amazing feeling to know that something small you are doing can make such a dramatic change in another person's life.  If you are "Thinking about it"  DO IT!
lenders.occupational_info: I teach medical staff how to use our  electronic medical record software in their clinic. So instead of having paper medical records all the information is on a web based system that the doctors access using a tablet pc and the internet.

lenders.name: Paul
lenders.loan_because: It's the best way I know to make a little money help someone a whole lot.
lenders.occupational_info: I train healthcare practices to use eClinicalWorks software, which is for electronic medical records and billing.

lenders.name: Bedan
lenders.loan_because: I love to give
lenders.occupational_info: I\'m an instructional designer at a 4yr Institution in California.

lenders.name: Michele
lenders.occupational_info: I study the environment.  I am currently trying to understand how trees use the chemicals available to them and the effects that trees have on their environment.

lenders.name: Karina
lenders.loan_because: It is starting to start and have your own business. The sense of empowerment is crucial for growth, confidence and happiness.
lenders.occupational_info: Teach first and third graders in all subject areas with emphasis on conflict resolution, acceptance and peace.

lenders.name: David & Kathi
lenders.loan_because: We want to,and the world will be a better place if we all learn to share.\r\n
lenders.occupational_info: I work construction operating a road grader,my wife is a nurse and helps sick people get better.

lenders.name: Harrison
lenders.loan_because: I really like the idea of micro finance. That a lot of good can be done by loaning small amounts of money to people who do not qualify for necessary loans, but are otherwise fully deserving.
lenders.occupational_info: Back end software integration stuffs.

lenders.name: Kimberly
lenders.loan_because:
I believe in the power of microlending, and I believe in the ability of working people to help themselves. I don't believe in charity or handouts - I like to see people working to make their lives better, not just expecting someone else to give them a handout. 

I also like to let my money do some good in the world, instead of just sitting in my bank account. 

I am currently supporting businesses in Mongolia because of my love of the people, and my interest in the culture and history of this country.
lenders.occupational_info:
I have experience in
- small business development
- information systems
- audit and quality assurance

lenders.name: H & B Pedersen
lenders.loan_because: I want to make a difference

lenders.name: Dan  Sever
lenders.loan_because: I feel it is important to help people in improving their lives, and making it a little easier to succeed.
lenders.occupational_info: I repair airplanes to make them safe for travel.

lenders.name: Totolos Family
lenders.loan_because: Microlending is a brilliant way for all of us to pool together small resources that make big differences to people across the world.

lenders.name: Jacob
lenders.loan_because: Because kids like me need people like you.
lenders.occupational_info: My dad\'s a designer.  He works with stone.

lenders.name: Mike T
lenders.loan_because: Chicks dig generous guys!
lenders.occupational_info: Adrenaline Junkie. I don't work, I play and give back to the less fortunate.

lenders.name: Jamie
lenders.loan_because: I want to be a part of helping someone achieve a better life thru their hard work and dedication.
lenders.occupational_info: I am a professional civil engineer. I specifically am a geotechnical engineer, and I analyze soil conditions in regards to constructing structures, roadways, levees, etc. I also perform seismic evaluations related to the design of new and existing structures.

lenders.name: girlgeek
lenders.loan_because: I was inspired by Mohammed Yunnis. Now I see that his genius has been taken over by loan sharks with a new name.  I have no faith in the honesty of the agencies Kiva funds.  I am trying to remove my money.  It is a long, slow, hard process.
lenders.occupational_info: I work with computers.

lenders.name: James
lenders.loan_because: I have been facinated by micro loans for a long time. And I believe in entrepenuers.
lenders.occupational_info: I design software, websites, and web applications

lenders.name: Amanda
lenders.loan_because: I believe that the human race is responsible for each other and our world. We need to help each other as much we can. When our neighbors thrive, so do we!

lenders.name: Andrea
lenders.loan_because: I think microloans are a wonderful way to make the world a smaller place and because it is a small thing that I can do that directly helps someone elses life
lenders.occupational_info: I sell supplies for people in laboratories doing scientific research.

lenders.name: carmina
lenders.loan_because: I think that its a great way to help people who want to get started on their own business
lenders.occupational_info: I work with children in a an elementary school. I help students with their reading, writing and their math when they need help

lenders.name: John
lenders.loan_because: I like to see people become successful through their own efforts.
lenders.occupational_info: Now, as little as possible

lenders.name: Thomas & Mei Jian
lenders.loan_because:
We would like to be a part of Jessica & Matthew Flannery's vision: "Loans that change lives".
 Kiva.org allows individuals, like my wife and I, to participate in low interest microlending to deserving entrepreneurs worldwide.

lenders.name: Judi
lenders.loan_because: I  want to provide opportunities to hard working people with few other resources.
lenders.occupational_info: I help Catholic elementary schools raising funds through alumni outreach, grant writing and support from friends.

lenders.name: Adrian
lenders.loan_because: I believe in a more sustainable and equitable world

lenders.name: Anna
lenders.loan_because: I want to help others get control of their future.

lenders.name: Carmen and John
lenders.loan_because: We feel that it's the right thing to do.  At this point in time we want to be able to say we stood on the right side of history.
lenders.occupational_info: We're a small business.  These good people are our colleagues.  We relate.

lenders.name: Adele
lenders.loan_because: microfinance is sustainable and empowering.
lenders.occupational_info: I work for a microfinance organization - one of Kiva's partners.

lenders.name: Global Expressions, LLC
lenders.loan_because: Ghandi once said, "In a gentle way, you can shake the world."  We believe in the global community, and support great ideas.  We feel that it is our personal responsibility to "shake the world", even if it is only $25 at a time.

lenders.name: Jim & Jeff (brothers)
lenders.loan_because: I opened this account as a Christmas gift between my little brother, Jeff, and I.  I admire this organization and find it an inspiration towards helping others.
lenders.occupational_info: I do computer work and Jeff is a high school student and race car driver...his web site is listed below.

lenders.name: Melissa
lenders.loan_because: I want others to be able to experience the freedom and accomplishment I feel from owning my own business.
lenders.occupational_info: We sell items on consignment for others on ebay

lenders.name: Alessandro
lenders.loan_because: I think that everybody should be given the opportunity to build their own future.

lenders.name: Walker Family
lenders.loan_because: We want to help people help themselves first, so they can then help others.

lenders.name: Greg
lenders.loan_because: I want to remember how fortunate I am relative to many in the world and to support passionate, entrepreneurial individuals who are less so.
lenders.occupational_info: I work for Yahoo! and participate in the community of U.S. internet entrepreneurs.

lenders.name: HAP
lenders.loan_because: I have been so fortunate in my life- and so many people have helped me along.  Now it is my turn!
lenders.occupational_info: Teacher, mentor, scientist.

lenders.name: Tyler
lenders.occupational_info: Monitoring & Facilitating Computer & Network Operations

lenders.name: Mark
lenders.loan_because: These people can really benefit from the cash we provide to them. Its a great way to get these highly motivated people started. I hope this very small help will get them further.

lenders.name: Kathi
lenders.loan_because: It's amazing to be able to connect on a one to one basis, I love the concept of a direct link between people whom would otherwise not even know of one another.
lenders.occupational_info: I'm trying to make the world a more beautiful place.

lenders.name: Susan
lenders.loan_because: I believe in empowering entrepreneurs and small businesses.
lenders.occupational_info: Love new ideas!

lenders.name: Jenna
lenders.loan_because: I would love to see other entrepreneurs succeed!
lenders.occupational_info: I mentor creative thinkers and doers into action making their projects real.

lenders.name: Christopher
lenders.loan_because: Why not?
lenders.occupational_info: I work in the media business in New York, and also write amusing gift books.

lenders.name: Allison
lenders.loan_because: of Kiva's mission to help end poverty by helping people to become self-sufficient.
lenders.occupational_info: I do research on poverty and the impact on child well-being, particularly in rural communities.

lenders.name: Walter
lenders.loan_because: I want people to benefit from hard work and gain their independence from government support.  I hope they in turn will help others.
lenders.occupational_info: I am active in volunteer work in my community.

lenders.name: peter
lenders.loan_because: God has blessed me in many ways, this is just a small way to give back.
lenders.occupational_info: I own a tow truck and buy junk cars, and sell them for scrap.

lenders.name: Jeff
lenders.loan_because: I have been supported my whole life by family and community. I would like to reach out and return that support to the larger community. Helping people help themselves.

lenders.name: Adrien
lenders.loan_because: I want to make a difference.
lenders.occupational_info: Teach high school

lenders.name: Ann
lenders.loan_because: I believe that promoting sustainable local economies is our best chance to change our relationship to the planet.
lenders.occupational_info: I work to eliminate human exposure from toxic chemicals in manufacturing and consumer products.

lenders.name: Brenda
lenders.loan_because: What little money I have can go a long way through Kiva.
lenders.occupational_info: Write, take photos, edit, make pages, produce three little newspapers every week.

lenders.name: Marisa
lenders.loan_because: Everyone has the ability to help someone else.  Whatever we do in our lives, we should think about the impact it has on other nations.
lenders.occupational_info: I am pursuing my education in nursing.

lenders.name: Maryam
lenders.loan_because: I have been there and know how difficult it is to borrow money whether you are in the developing or developed world.
lenders.occupational_info: I write software for one of the biggest Usury firms in the world! So, I never want to see someone in need of small amount of money for starting a business borrow from big companies with no heart.

lenders.name: Hilerie
lenders.loan_because: It\'s the right thing to do
lenders.occupational_info: Itake care of babies who are sick when they are born.

lenders.name: Jeff
lenders.loan_because: I see firsthand how people in many countries struggle to make a living.  Being a business owner I can relate to their dreams and difficulties.
lenders.occupational_info: I operate two tour companies, Adventure Dive & Travel and Lost in Italy.

lenders.name: Lynn
lenders.loan_because: I want to help someone succeed.
lenders.occupational_info: I take photographs and make paintings, as well as design advertizing. I enjoy designing for people who are starting businesses, so I design symbols, business cards, stationery, signs, brochures, as well as web sites.

lenders.name: David
lenders.loan_because: I have heard that microlending is one of the best ways to help economies in developing countries.  I like the idea of no middle-man cutouts.
lenders.occupational_info: Retired now, but worked in many countries around the world in years past, in the oil business.

lenders.name: Kendra
lenders.loan_because: Everyone deserves a chance to create their own success! My father was a Peace Core volunteer in Ghana and loved the country and its people; it\'s fun for me to be able to make my own contribution there.
lenders.occupational_info: Sales manager for a luxury bathroom and kitchen brand. We help architects and designers create beautiful spaces for their clients, a creative and satisfying job.

lenders.name: Michael
lenders.loan_because: It makes me feel good...
lenders.occupational_info: I work in a laboratory where I manage clinical trials.  My lab receives samples from patients, analyzes them and reports the findings to pharmaceutical companies

lenders.name: Theresa
lenders.loan_because: I receive far more in return than I give and for that I am both humbled  and blessed.

lenders.name: kim and doug
lenders.occupational_info: Rewarding!

lenders.name: Lee Ann
lenders.loan_because: I want to empower women to be in control of their lives.  Women can do anything!  They are strong and very smart and also compassionate - a very good combination!  I want to support other women who want to be in control of their lives.  I have been very blessed to live in the US.  I do not lack food and shelter.  Nor do I fear for my safety as people of other nations do. So I feel I want to give something back to make this world better than when I leave it.
lenders.occupational_info: I struggle every day to take care of my children and try to give them a better life than what I had.  I have 2 girls that I want to become very strong women.  And I want to teach them that the important thing in life is to love,and to use your gifts god has given you to make this wolrd a better place.

lenders.name: Caroline
lenders.loan_because: I can

lenders.name: Jorge & Joan
lenders.loan_because: We hope to help others achieve their goals.  We want others around the world to know that the United States has citizens that are good people.
lenders.occupational_info: We are both teachers.  We teach children that are 11-14 years old.  We have two children and love them dearly.

lenders.name: Melisa
lenders.loan_because: My passion is inspiring my clients to create their future and this is an opportunity to reach beyond my immediate environment.
lenders.occupational_info: I work with people and organizations to help them be more effective and productive.

lenders.name: Jordy
lenders.loan_because: I believe in the Kiva model.

lenders.name: Scholastica8
lenders.loan_because: I sometimes can.
lenders.occupational_info: I am a wardrobe person for films & TV series. I sometimes make costumes. I make sure that actors have the right costume on for the right scene & that it is on correctly. I keep notes & take photos to make certain that each time the scene is redone or the costume is used in other scenes, that the costume matches. We don\'t like to see a scarf that is tied on the left, then is suddenly tied on the right, then is suddenly back on the left.

lenders.name: Suzanne and Scott
lenders.loan_because: We\'ve traveled extensively and seen first-hand that it can take so little to make a huge difference in people\'s lives.  It\'s exciting to know that we can share what we have with people who will be able to make incredible changes in their lives and communities.

lenders.name: Joe
lenders.loan_because: I was given opportunities to succeed and so should others
lenders.occupational_info: Innovative healthcare delivery

lenders.name: Diane & Jadi
lenders.loan_because: Our family is so blessed that we would like to give back so others may achieve their goals!

lenders.name: Dan & Steffany
lenders.loan_because: My wife and I have been looking for a good cause to donate to that we feel comfortable with.  It\'s important to know where all our donations are going.  With Kiva we know that every penny we lend it is going directly to somone in need.  That feels good.
lenders.occupational_info: I install piping systems for heating and cooling for large commercial buildings.  My wife works for a telecom company that specializes in connecting companies around the world.

lenders.name: Holly
lenders.loan_because: I want to help others get established in building lives for themselves and their families.  I have so many blessings, and I want to share them with others.
lenders.occupational_info: I work with numbers in an office all day, and provide my employers with correct information in order to make financial decisions.

lenders.name: Dave and Tiffany
lenders.loan_because: I worked in a small hospital in Kisumu, Kenya during medical school and have a small understanding of how hardships like HIV/AIDS can affected families.
lenders.occupational_info: I take care of those with heart attacks

lenders.name: Steve E.
lenders.loan_because: It is an absolute honor to enable people to realize their dreams!
lenders.occupational_info: I am a dealer & collector of fine musical instruments.  I specialize in the wholesale of violins, violas, & celli.  Violins are my passion & I am fortunate enough to be living my Dream. Ain't life grand?

lenders.name: Kay
lenders.loan_because:
I can think of few other things as meaningful as making these loans.  The pictures and stories draw me in, enrich my life, and open my eyes. 

. . . except now that Kiva is cropping the pictures of the borrowers on the lenders' pages (see below), my enthusiasm for Kiva has waned.

In fact, all thumbnails that are not squares have been cropped, including those of the teams (see below) and of the lenders on the borrowers' and team pages.  This has all dimmed my enthusiasm because pictures have always been at the heart of Kiva, for me.  

So, you might say I'm now lending (if at all) under duress.

lenders.name: Trisha
lenders.loan_because: I believe everyone deserves a chance to make a better life for themselves.
lenders.occupational_info: I help others help themselves. So far I have worked in El Salvador, Ecuador, Iraq, and Afghanistan.

lenders.name: Benjamin
lenders.loan_because: I feel empowered to give other the opportunity to help themselves.  I feel microfinance is the way of the future
lenders.occupational_info: I am working to get into the microfinance industry and I am a entrepreneur

lenders.name: jainik
lenders.loan_because: it makes sense.

lenders.name: Jinx
lenders.loan_because: many people helped me along the way in my life, and I\\\'m pleased to honor them by passing on the gift.
lenders.occupational_info: As a volunteer, I help keep a free public library open for people who live here and those passing through.

lenders.name: Keri
lenders.loan_because: The greatest act of charity is to give a person an interest-free loan which allows them to live independently (Maimonides).
lenders.occupational_info: I work for a lawyer handling legal cases.

lenders.name: Michael
lenders.loan_because: There but for the grace of God go I.  From each according to his ability, to each according to his needs.  For I was hungry and you gave me nothing to eat, I was thirsty and you gave me nothing to drink, I was a stranger and you did not invite me in, I needed clothes and you did not clothe me, I was sick and in prison and you did not look after me.

lenders.name: Robin
lenders.loan_because: it goes so far towards providing self sufficiency and it makes sense to have connectivity with honorable people from around the world.
lenders.occupational_info: Sit at a desk and try to practice excellence.

lenders.name: Sherry
lenders.loan_because: I believe we should each be doing something to help those who need it, even if it is a small thing.
lenders.occupational_info: I write stories and publish books for others to read.

lenders.name: homeroom
lenders.loan_because: My Social Studies class is involved in helping people help themselves. We believe that it is better to \"teach a person to fish, than to give a person a fish\".
lenders.occupational_info: I am a teacher who is globally conscious.

lenders.name: Robert
lenders.loan_because: I believe that teaching a person to fish is better than just giving them the fish.  This program is a way to teach the entrepreneur how to develop sound financial skills and to succeed in a capitalist world.
lenders.occupational_info: I manage the financial operations of a private elementary school.

lenders.name: The Fisher Family
lenders.loan_because: Justice is at the heart of what Jesus taught. Helping to solve the cause of poverty is an act of justice. Kiva helps accomplish this.

lenders.name: Connie
lenders.loan_because: I want to empower poor people--especially women

lenders.name: Michael
lenders.loan_because: It's the right thing to do.
lenders.occupational_info: I respresent Buyers and Seller of real estate when property changes title.  I also develop property here in California and Mexico.

lenders.name: Heather
lenders.loan_because: We are all part of one human family, and it is most beneficial to help one another develop our strengths together. May we all believe in the sincerity of one another\'s hearts and give to one another in the most honorable way.
lenders.occupational_info: I work in a hospital out patient group therapy program for teenagers (and their parents) who are recovering from alcohol/drug addiction, depression, and life challenges.

lenders.name: Julie & Bill
lenders.loan_because: Our fixed contribution can be leveraged over and over and over to empower people in the Third World economically.  Economic empowerment encourages peace, education, and prosperity.

lenders.name: Vasilisa
lenders.loan_because: I want to make a positive difference in somebody's life. I can relate to many of the people seeking loans because of my background and childhood experiences from Uzbekistan, my home country.

lenders.name: Russ & Ellen
lenders.loan_because: My wife and I have owned two successful businesses.  Businesses succeed only when people share your vision of success.  Throughout our lifetime, various people have believed in us, and supported us through their friendship and love.  We want to give to those who dare to dream of a better life, which is built on their own hard work.
lenders.occupational_info: I work with Special Education students from the ages of 5 to 18, who have learning disabilities and emotional disturbances.  Ellen is a corporate trainer.

lenders.name: Anastasia
lenders.loan_because: I want to help other people in other parts of the world.
lenders.occupational_info: I am a student at Chatham Elementary School. I am in the third grade.

lenders.name: Joo and Ashley
lenders.loan_because: micro-lending works, and we believe that one of the purposes for wealth is to share it.

lenders.name: Donald
lenders.loan_because: I can.
lenders.occupational_info: I organize and lead tours around the world for photographers.

lenders.name: Holly
lenders.loan_because: I want to make a difference by giving someone a small pebble.  Hopefully with enough pebbles a strong foundation can be molded together to build a brighter future.

lenders.name: ZoomSnapClap
lenders.loan_because: We believe in the microfinance (peer to peer micro credit) model and what companies like Kiva are doing to make the world a better place!
lenders.occupational_info: We take photo's and reproduce them, create cards, calendars, books and video

lenders.name: David and Jennifer
lenders.loan_because: We want to feel connected to this world and to have an impact where possible.
lenders.occupational_info: David - I work on computers that allow and deny internet traffic to banking web sites.\r\nJennifer - I edit the content of childrens educational books used in public schools

lenders.name: Jena
lenders.loan_because: My way of making a small difference in the world.

lenders.name: Colleen
lenders.loan_because: I want to share.
lenders.occupational_info: I work with students to help them learn about our planet Earth and how it works.

lenders.name: Dan
lenders.loan_because: Proverbs 19:17   Exodus 22:25

lenders.name: Lisa
lenders.loan_because: It feels good to make a difference in someone\'s life.

lenders.name: Barbara
lenders.loan_because: Doing positive things on a personal scale.
lenders.occupational_info: As a computer systems analyst, I help decide how computer systems can help a business operate.

lenders.name: Joanne
lenders.loan_because: I want to help others suceed.
lenders.occupational_info: I own a small design firm. We specialize in web-based work, including web sites, intranets and software.

lenders.name: Georgia
lenders.loan_because: We decided to give kiva gifts instead of large Christmas presents this year.  We need to impact our world.
lenders.occupational_info: I support computers used to run a city government

lenders.name: Loyal
lenders.loan_because: I started out with nothing. Now I have a shop and a steady life because people took a risk on me when I was younger. It is time to pass it forward.
lenders.occupational_info: I have a bookshop in a college town. It is the best job I can imagine. I am able to participate in the education of many talented students.

lenders.name: Darrek
lenders.loan_because: I like to be able to help others build a better life for themselves. I also like the personal aspect of working with Kiva, it\'s a way to learn about different people and cultures.
lenders.occupational_info: My company surveys consumers to find out if they would be interested in buying potential new products. I decide the questions we ask to best help our clients decide what consumers think about their ideas.

lenders.name: Mark
lenders.loan_because: Many people have helped me in my life. Kiva is a wonderful opportunity for me to do the same for others.
lenders.occupational_info: I write history books.

lenders.name: Tatiana
lenders.loan_because: I'm withdrawing my funds from Kiva ... and making future loans through other organizations because Kiva continues to promote cockfighting businesses by posting cockfighting loans on the Kiva website. ..... For over a year Kiva has been requested by many, many Kiva lenders to please add bloodsports to the list of businesses for which Kiva will not post loans, but kiva management adamantly refuses. Therefore I am withdrawing my funds and am supporting other more humane organizations.
lenders.occupational_info: I design and install instrumentation and control systems for nuclear power plants.

lenders.name: Kimberly
lenders.loan_because: i have been blessed.
lenders.occupational_info: i get to help care for women throughout their pregnancies, and the labour and birth of their babies.  i help make sure they are healthy and happy.  i have the best job in the world!

lenders.name: Marcus
lenders.loan_because: I am a small business owner.  I want to help other entrepreneurs. ***lenders - name your wireless routers kiva.org to promote kiva
lenders.occupational_info: We manufacture packaging products used in hi-tech industries.

lenders.name: John
lenders.loan_because: I love others as Christ loves me.
lenders.occupational_info: I make loans to construct and acquire commercial real estate properties.

lenders.name: Nancy
lenders.loan_because: A little can go a long way.
lenders.occupational_info: I take care of sick people.

lenders.name: Brendon
lenders.loan_because:
I believe micro-lending is a far better solution to alleviating poverty than charity.

I have such an amazing abundance, and I love sharing that with people all over the world.
lenders.occupational_info: I am a Unix/Linux Administrator.

lenders.name: Rich & Lorrie
lenders.loan_because: Become an ELF: Eat Local Food. Support your neighborhood farmer. America is  becoming a third world country in terms of its food sources: industrial food will be our demise. No matter where you are,eat fresh, eat organic.  Think globally, eat locally.

lenders.name: Jill
lenders.loan_because: microloans are a more respectful alternative to charity or aid. People in need are not helpless and hopeless.  Microcredit enables people to meet their own needs, a much more dignified option.

lenders.name: Marco Santa
lenders.loan_because: We want to help.

lenders.name: Jason
lenders.loan_because: I have been given the opportunity to.

lenders.name: Alysia
lenders.loan_because: helping less fortunate women develop financial independence contributes to a better world for our children
lenders.occupational_info: Information Technology, Web Services

lenders.name: Benny
lenders.loan_because: I can.

lenders.name: Dhrumil
lenders.loan_because: Money is fuel.
lenders.occupational_info: I make things pretty.

lenders.name: Christopher
lenders.loan_because: I have the opportunity to make a real difference in the lives of others.  I can spare the money to divert a little out of my own savings and there are so many people in need that it feels irresponsible not to help where I can.
lenders.occupational_info: I write relatively small computer applications to solve relatively small problems.  I work on several different problems on most work days.

lenders.name: Adam
lenders.loan_because: Give someone a fish, feed them for a day.  Teach them to fish (or loan them the money to buy a net?) and feed them for life.
lenders.occupational_info: I carve stone to make beautiful artwork, and I drive a truck to deliver furniture to places like New York City.

lenders.name: Amber
lenders.loan_because: It was a gift, but now that I know about it I will do more to help.

lenders.name: Paul Whiteway
lenders.loan_because: Its more fun than eBay

lenders.name: Intaba Topera
lenders.occupational_info: We are a small but diverse group of teachers, students, scientists, soldiers, artists, liberals, and conservatives.  We have never agreed on ANYTHING except that microcredit is a good idea.

lenders.name: Elisabeth
lenders.loan_because: I believe in microfinancing and I love Latin-America (my son-in-law is from Ecuador). Right now I live in Cuenca and my borrowers in Ecuador don't even know that I live next door!
lenders.occupational_info: I am a retired radio journalist and an active teacher of English as a Second Language.

lenders.name: Peter
lenders.loan_because: It\'s making a difference in people\'s lives, it\'s bringing the people of the world closer together, and . . . because I can.
lenders.occupational_info: I teach language (German) and literature, and also hand drumming; I compose and direct theatrical and musical productions.

lenders.name: Nheng J.
lenders.occupational_info: passion for other people..

lenders.name: Wendy
lenders.loan_because: I can and because I need to.
lenders.occupational_info: I work to help children discover the  vast world opened up by reading.

lenders.name: Holly
lenders.loan_because: I want to help

lenders.name: The Chang Family
lenders.occupation: Nonprofit executive / Stay at home mom
lenders.loan_because: To much has been given...
lenders.occupational_info: Encouraging family based service and giving

lenders.name: James
lenders.loan_because: \'...imagine all the people...\'\r\n                  john lennon
lenders.occupational_info: we are all people in need...we need air, food, love.  hope this little money can bring some hope and a smile.

lenders.name: Michael
lenders.loan_because: we are all one family.

lenders.name: Ellen
lenders.loan_because: I believe everyone deserves a chance to do something on their own if they believe they can.  That\'s their gift to the world.  I want to support that.
lenders.occupational_info: I design small inspirational cards and signs. They are all positive phrases, so I let the words speak for themselves.

lenders.name: Heather
lenders.loan_because: It makes me happy to give. I think people should help eachother if they can.

lenders.name: Jeff
lenders.loan_because: It is the right thing to do.
lenders.occupational_info: Serving our Veterans

lenders.name: Jorge
lenders.loan_because:
Admiro el espiritu emprendedor de mis compatriotas mexicanos. Además, tener tu propio negocio es muy divertido! Yo tenía un puesto ambulante de dulces cuando era niño.

I appreciate the entrepreneurial spirit of my fellow Mexicans. Besides, having your own business is so much fun! I had a travelling candy stand growing up in Mexico City.
lenders.occupational_info:
Trato de imaginar nuevas maneras de hacer las cosas accesibles para personas con discapacidades.

I try to come up with new ideas to make things accessible to Disabled people.

lenders.name: Mike
lenders.loan_because: Knowing is not enough; we must apply. Willing is not enough; we must do.  (Bruce Lee, 1940-1973).
lenders.occupational_info: Sit at a desk all day long doing computer stuff.

lenders.name: Brian
lenders.loan_because: One Starfish at a time.
lenders.occupational_info: Visual Communication.

lenders.name: Merrilee
lenders.loan_because: I think that Kiva is doing something so important to help working people all around the world. I'm privileged to participate in this type of microloan. I haven't a lot of money, but I can do my part to help others this way.
lenders.occupational_info: I take care of my 92 year old mother, and work part-time taking care of elders in their home, as a fill-in care provider.

lenders.name: Dominique
lenders.loan_because: If I can be of help to someone, why not? It seems to be the normal thing to do as a human being. I also like that I know who is going to benefit from my loan and what this person is going to do with it.
lenders.occupational_info: I teach philosophy and French as a foreign language in an international school; I am also a photographer and printmaker.

lenders.name: Robert
lenders.loan_because: I want to help people directly. I like the fact that there\'s only the borrower, Kiva and me.
lenders.occupational_info: I design information systems.

lenders.name: Karen&Ramon
lenders.loan_because: everyone needs some help sometime
lenders.occupational_info: We are retired and spend most of our time traveling to see our four children & eight grandchildren all over the U.S. and Venezuela.

lenders.name: Oliver
lenders.loan_because: I was a Peace Corps Volunteer in Togo from 97\'-99\'
lenders.occupational_info: I run a youth serving, community based, non-profit agency in San Francisco.

lenders.name: David
lenders.loan_because: I want to help people and I feel like lending is the best way to do it.  When I get paid back I can used that money again to help more people.
lenders.occupational_info: I design communications towers and I'm bringing 4G all over the Northeast.

lenders.name: Rebecca
lenders.loan_because: I lived and worked in West Africa for a while and saw how small loans to women could change an entire family\'s circumstances.
lenders.occupational_info: I take care of small and large animals in a clinic.

lenders.name: Morgan Smith
lenders.loan_because: Kiva provides an excellent opportunity to empower and aid people by helping them to help themselves.

lenders.name: Karen
lenders.loan_because: Everyone needs a little help at some time in their life.
lenders.occupational_info: I manage a company of 94 employees.  I am mainly in charge of human resources and the computer programs we sell our customers.

lenders.name: Josef & Donna
lenders.loan_because: To enable a world where everyone has meaningful work and receives a fair share of the fruits of their labor.
lenders.occupational_info: Josef builds software others use to design computer chips.  Donna creates beautiful things from flowers and fabrics.

lenders.name: Teri
lenders.loan_because: I want "people in need" to be a part of my life and I, in some way, a part of their life.

lenders.name: Kristin
lenders.loan_because: Together we can make a difference.
lenders.occupational_info: I work at a university and am blessed with two children.

lenders.name: Keith and Mary
lenders.loan_because: We want to share the blessings God hass given to us, helping others to develop and grow.
lenders.occupational_info: We protect homes and businesses from theft and invasion and fire by means of electronic devices properly and skillfully installed.

lenders.name: Jennifer and Mike
lenders.occupation: Business Development Rep and Loan Officer
lenders.loan_because: We decided to join Kiva because we wanted to see our donations make a difference.  It is exciting to see that in some small way you can help to change a persons life.

lenders.name: Bette
lenders.loan_because: I want to help persons to establish themselves.
lenders.occupational_info: I am a retired medical laboratory technician and histologist who worked in a pathology service.

lenders.name: joe
lenders.loan_because: I came from a then developing country to the US.  I saw my parents struggled to raise 10 kids, and witnessed how a little resource can go a long way in helping to establish a foothold. I firmly believe that this is THE way of helping people financially in a dignifying way.
lenders.occupational_info: Retired engineer and artist want-to-be.

lenders.name: Chayo
lenders.loan_because: I like to help.
lenders.occupational_info: Interesting

lenders.name: Claudia
lenders.loan_because: I can help change someone\'s life including my own.
lenders.occupational_info: School is very simple.

lenders.name: Robin
lenders.loan_because: I believe in capitalism and fundamental economic principles will work any where they are honestly tried.
lenders.occupational_info: I work in a bakery in a larger grocery store.  As an employee of the company I use it's capital to make my living. Also as  a shareholder in the company I expect a return on my investment.

lenders.name: Tracy
lenders.loan_because: I like to help people be happy.
lenders.occupational_info: I help small and large businesses grow and sustain their business within the community.

lenders.name: Christine
lenders.loan_because: I think it's important for someone to do their part if they want to see an end to world poverty.

lenders.name: Family Fund
lenders.loan_because: we want to help others

lenders.name: The Koppel Family
lenders.occupational_info: Steve is a business consultant and Paula is a nurse.  They spend most of their time performing volunteer work with several organizations in the Boston area.  David and Katie are high school students.

lenders.name: janet
lenders.loan_because: I feel it is the right thing to do. From struggling to make ends meet myself, I understand how much a small loan can help. Small business assists in local sustainability and stability.
lenders.occupational_info: I am an artist/artisan making quilts to custom order. I also deal in vintage and antique textiles and Nova Scotian Folk Art. In addition, I am involved in sustainable local rural community development.

lenders.name: peg
lenders.loan_because: I love the idea of people helping each other. The little I give is returned a hundred fold just by knowing someone is able to follow their dream.

lenders.name: Martine
lenders.loan_because: I want to help these hard working people  improve their life conditions and to keep faith in their future.

lenders.name: Alex
lenders.loan_because: microfinance is a sustainable vehicle for small business development and growth.
lenders.occupational_info:
I founded a program getting youth involved in microlending, Youth Microcredit International.

Now, I'm focused more broadly, through the Youth Social Enterprise Network

lenders.name: Iron Sheik
lenders.loan_because: Karma!!
lenders.occupational_info: I pretend to be an Electrical Engineer and sometimes a Middle school Teacher.  But in reality I have been a full time comedian all my life.

lenders.name: Marc Krejci
lenders.loan_because: It's not about me.

lenders.name: Denise & Roger
lenders.loan_because: I believe this idea will help people help themselves.

lenders.name: Anand
lenders.loan_because: That\'s the right thing to do.
lenders.occupational_info: Aspiring high-tech entrepreneur myself. Have been involved in a start-up in india in 1998. Looking forward to start a new one soon, while learning \"dos and donts\" of the high-tech industry.

lenders.name: John
lenders.loan_because: I enjoy helping people help themselves; at one time or another  we all need a hand to help raise ourselves up.
lenders.occupational_info: I help people borrow money at favorable rates so that they can buy a home.

lenders.name: Kerry
lenders.loan_because: it's the right thing to do.

lenders.name: Christine
lenders.loan_because: This is a great opportunity for anyone without large sums of money to donate, to still make a huge impact.  Helping one business is really helping an entire community.
lenders.occupational_info: I work in sales and marketing for a heavy duty truck manufacturer.

lenders.name: Amy
lenders.loan_because: I feel it is important for everyone who is able to help others who need it.
lenders.occupational_info: I am a mom of an 8 year old who works part time.  I also competitively figure/ice skate.

lenders.name: Lou
lenders.occupational_info: I am a criminal defense attorney who takes only court appointed cases, which means I represent only people charged with crimes who cannot afford to hire their own lawyer.

lenders.name: Mary
lenders.loan_because: I believe this is a small world, and what benefits one, benefits all.  Life is hard enough, so if I can do anything to make someone else's life a little easier, I feel I have to.
lenders.occupational_info: I deeply believe that business and employment is the strongest and most sustainable tool for development and alleviation of poverty; allowing for a more just and peaceful world for ALL.

lenders.name: dale& emily
lenders.loan_because: i started my business 23 years ago with a chainsaw and a tabogan. years have past and i know that hard work yields big rewards if given the chance
lenders.occupational_info:
my small company trims trees and removes trees the might  cause problems with power lines , be rotten
or might fall on peoples homes.

lenders.name: Dave
lenders.loan_because: This just makes sense to me.  A great opportunity to help.
lenders.occupational_info: I manage a state forest in central Florida

lenders.name: Robert
lenders.loan_because: I believe most people simply want an opportunity to build their own future. To provide for their own families. And to help create a self-sufficient economy for their community.

lenders.name: Mark
lenders.loan_because: I can.  It's feels better to make a difference than to make a buck.
lenders.occupational_info: REALLY examine needs and wants.  We want quite a bit and need very little!

lenders.name: ingrid
lenders.loan_because: I love what Kiva is working to accomplish.
lenders.occupational_info: I work with communities to consider solutions to short and long range transportation issues.

lenders.name: Anonymous
lenders.loan_because: microlending works.

lenders.name: joan
lenders.loan_because: I love the idea of directly helping others (women in my case) without administration costs and politics intervening.
lenders.occupational_info: I draw pictures, mostly with the computer, for books used in college classes studying biology and other sciences.

lenders.name: Rich
lenders.loan_because: I care about those in all parts of the world, not just where I live.
lenders.occupational_info: I teach youth (12-14 years old) about mathematics.

lenders.name: Coop
lenders.loan_because: I can and I appreciate the scale of this sort of person-to-person support.
lenders.occupational_info: In my work I provide needed support to developmentally challenged adults.

lenders.name: Jessica
lenders.loan_because: I think it is important to help others

lenders.name: Jeff and Sharon
lenders.loan_because: I am aware that I live a full and prosperous life, and I would like to assist someone to achieve the same, relative to their own family and culture.

lenders.name: Debi & McGee
lenders.loan_because: Money is a tool not a goal.  I believe putting it to use is more interesting than consuming.  Loaning to others furthers the wealth I have been graced with.

lenders.name: Nick
lenders.loan_because: I can. I loan because I should.

lenders.name: Sarah
lenders.loan_because: Even though I don't have a lot I have enough to share.  It gives me joy to help.

lenders.name: Heather
lenders.occupational_info: I work for a television news broadcast.

lenders.name: Ben
lenders.loan_because: it is a  way to honor God with the abundance that He as given me.    It is a way to use money to serve others rather then myself.
lenders.occupational_info: I design medical devices that are used by surgeons or doctors during an operation.

lenders.name: Jessica
lenders.loan_because: I have made these loans in honor of my family that is composed of Masselinks, Brandmillers and DeJongs! Helping pride and enterprise grow is a joy.

lenders.name: Mark
lenders.loan_because: it's a privilege to provide opportunity for others.
lenders.occupational_info: I manage resources for the benefit of individuals with disabilities, and their families.

lenders.name: George & Nancy
lenders.loan_because: We want to share our blessings

lenders.name: Teresa
lenders.loan_because: I want to start learning to manage investments but with a total amount that I have available under $500 it\'s really hard.  I figure microloans will help me learn while helping people -- and if I don\'t get paid back, it\'s charity.
lenders.occupational_info: I am studying to be a statistician.  I want to help understand and improve medicine or automobile safety by helping researchers with statistics.

lenders.name: thomas
lenders.loan_because: I loan from a sense of global humanity and the feeling that although not financially wealthy I nevertheless lead a privileged life.
lenders.occupational_info: I'm a licensed medical practitioner using natural methods such as acupuncture, plant medicines and vitamin supplements.

lenders.name: Victor
lenders.loan_because: Lack is a virus that plagues world\r\nAbundance is a privilege that ravages the west, A helping hand is what turns lack into abundance\r\n

lenders.name: Sean
lenders.loan_because: It is a great feeling to see that someone has a dream and I can contribute in some small way toward making that dream real.  When one of these loans gets paid off,  I am often moved by the thought of another dream that has been realized.  It is a blessing to be a part of this process!
lenders.occupational_info: In this world we are all a part of the great Circle of Life!  My work with people and the environment is to ensure that the Circle stays intact, with love and respect for all!

lenders.name: Kyle
lenders.loan_because: everyone needs to help end poverty.
lenders.occupational_info: i go to secondary school. im in my third year. my favorite subject is math.

lenders.name: Mandy
lenders.loan_because: I care
lenders.occupational_info: I'm a photographer and a humanitarian. I take photos of beauty and of pain around the world so that people can see that their choices affect everyone everywhere.

lenders.name: Tarun Sethi
lenders.loan_because: To support the struggling families and individuals in their quest for better lives.  I hope that my loans provide the necessary funds to improve lives and help people stand on their feet with dignity.  I hope my loans will fulfill somoene's wishes.

lenders.name: Niloufar and Soroush
lenders.loan_because:
Niloufar says because "I want to be nice".

Soroush loans because "It's the best thing to share and the thing to do when someone doesn't have money."
lenders.occupational_info: We're in 3rd grade.

lenders.name: Cathy, Brian and Wolfie
lenders.loan_because: I want to  help people in other places who don't have the advantages we have here.

lenders.name: Scott Frank
lenders.loan_because: I've lived in third world countries and know how a little help can make a difference
lenders.occupational_info: Sell used auto parts

lenders.name: Lynn
lenders.loan_because: I like the idea of helping individuals meet their goals.
lenders.occupational_info: I assist community based groups work together to restore their environment.

lenders.name: Kristen
lenders.loan_because: I have more than I need. I want others to be able to work to take care of themselves and their family. I want them to feel a sense of dignity and self-respect. I want to give because I can.
lenders.occupational_info: I am a mother of a young girl. My work is to take care of her, and my husband. I also tutor students who have special needs a few hours a week.

lenders.name: Andreas Dittes
lenders.loan_because: Empowering people & supporting entrepreneurs worldwide.

lenders.name: Kurt
lenders.loan_because: There are many in this world who have  lacked opportunity;  in a small way I want to help them, help themselves attain a better life.

lenders.name: Vidhu
lenders.loan_because: I hope my donation makes an impact on someones life...
lenders.occupational_info: I am full time time computer engineer..

lenders.name: Jon
lenders.loan_because: I've benefitted from borrowing money and know that capital is important for dreams to become reality.
lenders.occupational_info: I run a local bus system in New Mexico.

lenders.name: OliverFamily
lenders.occupational_info: music software teacher

lenders.name: Rudi Mölling
lenders.loan_because: Microcedits are probably the best way to allieve poverty in the world, helping through selfhelp. Beats normal charity every time!
lenders.occupational_info: I work in a liberal/libertarian political party in Sweden.

lenders.name: Erin
lenders.loan_because: I received a gift certificate from my grandparents to join with them and my mother in helping others.

lenders.name: Houston
lenders.loan_because: I believe in the power of microfinance and its effects on developing nations. I am doing my small share for social and economic development.
lenders.occupational_info: I manage construction of hotels and condos.

lenders.name: Dean
lenders.loan_because: my gift will positively impact a family and their life.

lenders.name: Brad
lenders.loan_because: God, by sending Christ to pay for my sins, has changed my life and this is just another great way to help hardworking people across the world.
lenders.occupational_info: Reinforce telecommunication towers and poles at a structural engineering firm.

lenders.name: James
lenders.loan_because: I think microloans to small business entrepreneurs is a great way help to improve not only their lives but will contribute to world stability in the long run.
lenders.occupational_info: I am a retired Database Administrator.

lenders.name: Lightfoots
lenders.loan_because: we can.

lenders.name: Andrew
lenders.loan_because: It's the right thing to do!
lenders.occupational_info: I design and sell custom wine cellars.

lenders.name: Brittany
lenders.loan_because: I have a responsibility to help those less fortunate.

lenders.name: Leo
lenders.occupational_info: I am a father and, as such, everything I do is for the support, strength, and education of my children. It's important for them to know how to help others no matter where they are.

lenders.name: Jim & Liz
lenders.loan_because: We hope to make someone's life a little easier.  To help those who want to help themselves.  Hopefully the loan recipients will be able to "pay it forward" someday.

lenders.name: Anthony Garcia
lenders.loan_because: I love the idea of lending directly to an indulvidual where 100% of the loan goes right into their business. \"Buy a man a fish you feed him for a day,teach him to fish he eats for a lifetime\"...

lenders.name: Rick
lenders.loan_because:
I participate in this program because it allows me to help other people of the world that are less fortunate and just need a helping hand to create a life for themselves.  It is a  people-to-people demonstration and commitment to the those in need that other's more fortunate really do care. 
     Empowering women around the world is one of the best way to reduce poverty and population growth in the world as education and economic conditions improve.

lenders.name: Eric
lenders.loan_because: To make positive connections to people in other parts of the world, who are working hard to improve their families and communities.

lenders.name: Janel
lenders.loan_because: I want to contribute in some small way to uplifting my sisters and brothers around the world.
lenders.occupational_info: I work in a graduate university with students and faculty - maintaining records, assisting students and generally ensuring that the school functions well.

lenders.name: Christinafiets Hofstad
lenders.loan_because: unas paquettas paporras papieras
lenders.occupational_info: every beetle has its needle

lenders.name: Jessica
lenders.loan_because: To help others help themselves

lenders.name: Jennifer
lenders.loan_because: I'm a small business owner and I feel a connection to people trying to start their own business. I love seeing small businesses succeed.
lenders.occupational_info: I'm a glass artist/graphic designer. I design websites, business cards, brochures, create animations and edit videos. I also make and sell glass jewelry.

lenders.name: Kerry
lenders.loan_because: I\'m part of a women\'s reading group that has been together for 24 yrs. We have always done our best to support each other through difficult times. We want to extend that support to others in the hope it will bring to these women, some financial independence and a sense of empowerment. Instead of paying for a book this month, we decided to use our money to put toward a few loans. We are all excited about being part of this micro-loan program.
lenders.occupational_info: I find people (mentors) to support young adults, ages 16-21, who have a disability and are leaving high school and want to find jobs or continue on to college.

lenders.name: Pico
lenders.loan_because: I live in a nice house with a soft, comfortable bed to sleep on.  I always have plenty of dog food to eat.  Humans are good to me, and I think they should have the opportunity to improve their lives by hard work and dedication.  I would like to help those that are interested in helping themselves.  Hopefully my small loans can be beneficial to those who need some help.
lenders.occupational_info: Fetch the ball.

lenders.name: Payton
lenders.loan_because: I think it is important to give others the same opportunity to succeed that I\'ve been given.
lenders.occupational_info: I am currently a student in business school at London Business School.  I am studying entrepreneurship so that one day I can start my own business also.

lenders.name: Christine
lenders.loan_because: It feels great to empower other entrepreneurs.
lenders.occupational_info: As and online marketing and PR specialist, I help businesses optimize their online communications for higher search engine ranking and higher customer conversions.

lenders.name: Kiran
lenders.loan_because: I\'ve felt the pain of being an independent developer with no money to finance my ideas, and I can understand how much more acute this can be in parts of the world.
lenders.occupational_info: I design information spaces.
